executable.title: Add Scalar Volumes
executable.description: Adds two images. Although all image types are supported on input, only signed types are produced. The two images do not have to have the same dimensions.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

integer-enumeration.name: order
integer-enumeration.label: Interpolation order
integer-enumeration.description: Interpolation order if two images are in different coordinate frames or have different sampling.
